list.name: Changes
list.comment: *KSD upper and lower limit values in "eclipsetiming" widget were corrected.

task.summary:
* New windows were added to LC and DC widgets, which show Physical Parameters from "lcout.active" files.
* A function was added to compute luminosity of each component in solar luminosity unit.
* Bugfix and improvement in Solution History widget.
* DC plot widget improvement was made for "phase" based plots.
* Solution history widget was restored to the committed file at 22nd February 2022.

* Semi-major axis value was added to DC widget (under Physical parameter tab).
* Fractional radius information was added to DC widget (under Physical parameter tab).
* Default phase range in plot window under DC widget was changed. Current phase range is between -0.25 and 1.25. So, in light curve plots, two primary eclipses and one secondary eclipse can be seen in the window.
* A small modification in DC widget was done.
* Semi-major axis value was added to the information window in synthetic curve widget.

* Computation of radial velocity semi-amplitudes of the components were added. Computed values are printed under "System Information" tab in DC widget ("RV Info" header).
* LC widget was updated. Now, all boxes (including third body contribution, l3) accept negative values.
* Limb darkening coefficients and light ratios of the components were added to "System Information" tab in DC widget (LC Info header). These values are printed if a light curve is plotted via "use LC" option. If user does not check "use LC" box, program does not print these values. This is also the case if velocity curve is plotted, regardless situation of "use LC" box (checked or unchecked).

*Behaviour of "Conjunctions" button under "System" tab was updated.
*Small change in format of time unit "second" was applied and typing error was fixed in "JD-UT Coversion" tab under "Tools" tab.
*Small modification of phase ranges in "curveproperties dialog" was made.
*Behaviour of "Synthetic curve widget" was updated.
*Maximum number of external and internal iterations in dc widget was updated to 9999.
*Tab orders were updated in widgets.

*MODE1 related limb darkening coefficient constraint defined in PyWD2015 was updated.
*Behaviour of "Conjunctions" button under "System" tab was updated.
*Small change in format of time unit "second" was applied and typing error was fixed in "JD-UT Coversion" tab under "Tools" tab.
*Small modification of phase ranges in "curveproperties dialog" was made.
*Behaviour of "Synthetic curve widget" was updated.
*Maximum number of external and internal iterations in dc widget was updated to 9999.
*Tab orders were updated in widgets.

*MODE1 related limb darkening coefficient constraint defined in PyWD2015 was updated.
*Behaviour of "Conjunctions" button under "System" tab was updated.
*Small change in format of time unit "second" was applied and typing error was fixed in "JD-UT Coversion" tab under "Tools" tab.
*Small modification of phase ranges in "curveproperties dialog" was made.
*Behaviour of "Synthetic curve widget" was updated.
*Maximum number of external and internal iterations in dc widget was updated to 9999.
*Tab orders were updated in widgets.
*Format of "SIGMA" value in curveproperties dialog was increased to 12 decimals.
*Bug fixes in plot functions of "DC widget".
*KSD upper and lower limit values in "eclipsetiming" widget were corrected.

MESSAGE.value:
* New windows were added to LC and DC widgets, which show Physical Parameters from "lcout.active" files.
* A function was added to compute luminosity of each component in solar luminosity unit.
* Bugfix and improvement in Solution History widget.
* DC plot widget improvement was made for "phase" based plots.
* Solution history widget was restored to the committed file at 22nd February 2022.

* Semi-major axis value was added to DC widget (under Physical parameter tab).
* Fractional radius information was added to DC widget (under Physical parameter tab).
* Default phase range in plot window under DC widget was changed. Current phase range is between -0.25 and 1.25. So, in light curve plots, two primary eclipses and one secondary eclipse can be seen in the window.
* A small modification in DC widget was done.
* Semi-major axis value was added to the information window in synthetic curve widget.

* Computation of radial velocity semi-amplitudes of the components were added. Computed values are printed under "System Information" tab in DC widget ("RV Info" header).
* LC widget was updated. Now, all boxes (including third body contribution, l3) accept negative values.
* Limb darkening coefficients and light ratios of the components were added to "System Information" tab in DC widget (LC Info header). These values are printed if a light curve is plotted via "use LC" option. If user does not check "use LC" box, program does not print these values. This is also the case if velocity curve is plotted, regardless situation of "use LC" box (checked or unchecked).

*Behaviour of "Conjunctions" button under "System" tab was updated.
*Small change in format of time unit "second" was applied and typing error was fixed in "JD-UT Coversion" tab under "Tools" tab.
*Small modification of phase ranges in "curveproperties dialog" was made.
*Behaviour of "Synthetic curve widget" was updated.
*Maximum number of external and internal iterations in dc widget was updated to 9999.
*Tab orders were updated in widgets.

*MODE1 related limb darkening coefficient constraint defined in PyWD2015 was updated.
*Behaviour of "Conjunctions" button under "System" tab was updated.
*Small change in format of time unit "second" was applied and typing error was fixed in "JD-UT Coversion" tab under "Tools" tab.
*Small modification of phase ranges in "curveproperties dialog" was made.
*Behaviour of "Synthetic curve widget" was updated.
*Maximum number of external and internal iterations in dc widget was updated to 9999.
*Tab orders were updated in widgets.
*Format of "SIGMA" value in curveproperties dialog was increased to 12 decimals.
*Bug fixes in plot functions of "DC widget".
*KSD upper and lower limit values in "eclipsetiming" widget were corrected.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: *KSD upper and lower limit values in "eclipsetiming" widget were corrected.
